name: Fox Trick
summary: You always have time for a joke or prank.
description:
You always have time for a joke or prank. You Create a Diversion, Conceal an Object, or Hide. All creatures who witnessed your Fox Trick then wise up to it, becoming temporarily immune to your Fox Trick for 24 hours.Traits

Kitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
